channel.title: Problem with 508 run server! please help!
channel.description:
When i run my 508 source since i edited with my jre, when i run it, it says "could not find main class:net/com/espeon/server. program will exit"
My jre in my servers run is edited like this:
@echo off cls cd ../build "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 goto main pause
Also i have jdk1.6.0_17 is installed in my computer and i cant find it in my java files, it does not appear, the only program that appears is jre6
and at the last part of my servers edit (javaw.exe) ive put \javac.exe and \java.exe before but they both give me errors such as "unknown source"
PLEASE HELP ME :'( :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :(

item.title: Problem with 508 run server! please help!
item.dc:creator: @moparscape5399 moparscape5399
item.description:
@moparscape5399 wrote:

When i run my 508 source since i edited with my jre, when i run it, it says “could not find main class:net/com/espeon/server. program will exit”

My jre in my servers run is edited like this:

@echo off
cls
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
goto main
pause

Also i have jdk1.6.0_17 is installed in my computer and i cant find it in my java files, it does not appear, the only program that appears is jre6

and at the last part of my servers edit (javaw.exe) ive put \javac.exe and \java.exe before but they both give me errors such as “unknown source”

PLEASE HELP ME :’(

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with 508 run server! please help!
